modName: Craftable and Upgradeable Scaled Horn Armor
summary: i like that armor, it makes you look like a bandit scum
descriptionHtml: simple mod that allows to craft and upgrade the scaled horn armor at forges. It is exactly as the standard one by terms of defense, weight, the only difference in one goat hide.
author: DarkDuzio
